ggr6 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Graphics Renderer

Source: R/renderer-graphics.R
RendererGraphics.Rd

A Renderer based on the graphics package. This is mostly used for testing at the moment.

Super class

ggr6::Renderer -> RendererGraphics
